mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews(comment, star, pitch_id, user_id, create_at, update_at) VALUES (#{comment}, #{star}, #{pitchId}, #{userId}, #{createAt}, #{updateAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, comment, star, pitch_id AS pitchId, user_id AS userId, create_at AS createAt, update_at AS updateAt FROM reviews WHERE pitch_id = #{pitchId} AND (#{userId} IS NULL OR #{userId} = 0 OR #{userId} = user_id)
SELECT id, comment, star, pitch_id AS pitchId, user_id AS userId, create_at AS createAt, update_at AS updateAt FROM reviews WHERE id = #{id}
